item.title: Exploring the new list pattern
item.description: Daily Knowledge Drop C# 11 (being released towards the end of 2022 with.NET7) is introducing the new list pattern which allows for matching against lists and arrays. One can also match to zero or more elements (which can then be captured or discarded) in the list pattern, using the new slice pattern, two single dots (..) The below examples are using C# 11 preview 2, so may change by final release.
